options.title: Minecraft
options.descr: Minecraft is an open-world survival video game created by Markus Persson and developed by Mojang Studios. Minecraft allows players to build and destroy objects located in a randomly generated game world. The player can attack creatures they encounter, collect resources, and craft items.

options.title: Rust
options.descr: The only goal in Rust is survival. Everything wants you to die: the island's wildlife and other inhabitants, the environment, other survivors. Do whatever it takes to survive another night.

options.title: CS2
options.descr: CS2 builds on the team-based action gameplay that the series pioneered when it launched over 20 years ago. CS:GO features new maps, characters, weapons, and game modes, and offers updated versions of classic CS and CS:GO content.

options.title: Hosting Panel
options.descr: Hosting Panel is a tool that allows you to manage your server. With it, you can easily monitor and configure.
